long_description: The Gibbon Treewear/DVD combo package sets you up with handy accessories to help you improve your slacklining skills and protect the bark of trees while you're at it. Includes 2 Treewear pads made from felt to protect your slackline and the bark of trees from abrasion; rip-and-stick closures keep the pads wrapped around trees during setup. Includes the Gibbon Slackline 101 DVD that teaches you everything you need to know to set up your slackline (sold separately), learn to walk on it and start doing tricks.
short_description: The Gibbon Treewear/DVD combo package sets you up with handy accessories to help you improve your slacklining skills and protect the bark of trees while you're at it.
